briefTitle: An Efficacy and Safety Study of Ravulizumab in Adult Participants With NMOSD
officialTitle: A Phase 3, External Placebo-Controlled, Open-Label, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Ravulizumab in Adult Patients With Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder (NMOSD)
summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ravulizumab for the treatment of adult participants with NMOSD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With an Adjudicated On-trial Relapse in the Primary Treatment Period
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline up to 2.25 years (end of the Primary Treatment Period)
